title: ICSC 2024
location: University of Music and Performing Arts, Vienna
description:
International Csound Conference
Session 16: Integrated Csound 2
Opening mind by opening architecture: analysis strategies

title: SIMC Festival - Autumn - IX concert
description:
SIMC Festival - Autumn - IX concert.
Commissioned piece: Lumina (2024) for fixed media.
Organized by SIMC (Società Italiana Musica Contemporanea)

title: IMPULSE Tour (1)
location: Instituto Nacional de la Música, Costa Rica
description:
Percussionist Niccolò Fino's Tour.
Commissioned piece: (ec)stasis (2024) for for marimba, vibraphone, multi-percussion and live electronics.
Produced in collaboration with AltreMenti Labs and supported by the Centro Nacional de la Música, Instituto Nacional de la Música, Universidad de las Artes de Yucatàn, and the 2024 Tour Export program by Puglia Sounds.

title: SIMC - Progetto teatrale
location: Sala Casalini, Hotel Due Torri, Verona
description:
SIMC - Progetto teatrale.
Commissioned piece: La notte (2025) for reciting voice and electric guitar on the short story “La Notte” by Lucy Gazzieri.
Musician: Giuseppe Dardano, electric guitar.

title: La musica. Da Pitagora all’AI. Un discorso a tre voci
location: Museo della Fotografia, Via Orabona 4, Bari
description: Concerti del Politecnico VI edizione - “Musica e intelligenza artificiale, dai suoni agli algoritmi”. There will also be contributions from Francesco Scagliola and Rossella Calella (Conservatorio “N. Piccinni” - Bari)

title: IHM - ArteScienza 2025
description:
ArteScienza 2025.
IHM (2025) concert-opera for reciting voices on fixed media, artificial voices, four augmented cellos and live electronics.
Musicians: Roberta Pastore, Donatello Notarnicola, Emanuela Storelli, Fedora Palladino, Daniele Giuseppe Annese, Francesco Vitucci

title: Re-sonanti
location: Consiglio Regionale Puglia, Via Gentile 52, Bari
description: “L’intelligenza artificiale non è più un’opzione”, twelfth appointment of the project “C6?.! Le 6 C”. The meeting will feature a music performance by Niccolò Fino (percussionist) and Francesco Vitucci (live electronics), performing (ec)stasis (2024), on a multi-channel ambisonic system.

title: Notti Sacre 2025
location: Auditorium Diocesano Vallisa, Strada Vallisa 11, Bari
description:
(ec)stasis (2024) for for marimba, vibraphone, multi-percussion and live electronics.
Niccolò Fino, percussion. Francesco Vitucci, live electronics.

title: Imago Hominis Myrae
location: Teatro Piccinni, Corso Vittorio Emanuele II, 84, Bari
description:
Commissioned piece: "Imago Hominis Myrae" (2025), for reciting voice, orchestra and fixed media.
Musicians: ICO Metropolitana di Bari, Francesco Vitucci, fixed media.
Conductor: Vittorio Parisi

title: Ri-lettura 2
location: Teatro Traetta, Largo Teatro Umberto I, 17, Bitonto
description:
Commissioned piece: "Canto senza pietra" (2025), for flute, alto saxophone and piano.
Musicians: Ozone Sea Trio

title: Innesto: Habitat della Memoria
location: Teatro Centrale, Via Giacomo Matteotti, 107, Sanremo
description:
Commissioned piece: "Innesto: Habitat della Memoria" (2025), for choir, percussion ensemble and orchestra.

title: Musica e/è scienza

description: Parametri di riccorrenza musicale: il caso studio della roughness

title: Ouverture inaugurale
description:
